mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offers (name, category, description, creationdate, status, modificationdate, usuario) VALUES( #{oferta.name}, #{categoryId}, #{oferta.description}, #{oferta.creationDate}, #{oferta.status}, #{oferta.modificationDate}, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, description, creationdate, status, modificationdate, usuario FROM offers WHERE offers.usuario = #{usuario};

SELECT o.id, o.name,
c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, c.description as c_description, c.creationdate as c_creationdate, c.status as c_status, c.modificationdate as c_modificationdate,
o.description, o.creationdate, o.status, o.modificationdate,
u.id as u_id, u.name as u_name, u.password as u_password, u.email as u_email, u.status as u_status, u.numero_necesidades as u_numero_necesidades, u.numero_ofertas as u_numero_ofertas,
ut.id as ut_id, ut.name as ut_name, ut.description as ut_description
FROM offers o JOIN categories c ON o.category = c.id JOIN users u ON o.usuario = u.id JOIN usertypes ut ON u.usertype = ut.id;
mapper.update: UPDATE Offers SET status=#{status}, modificationdate = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{id};
